title: Mad Money Host Jim Cramer Says ‘Bitcoin Is Topping Out’
description: Jim Cramer, the host of CNBC’s Mad Money show, says bitcoin is topping out. He recently said bitcoin cannot be killed, emphasizing that “It’s a technological marvel, and people have to start recognizing that it’s here to stay.” Cramer’s remarks followed a surge in the crypto market, with bitcoin surpassing $47,000 on Monday, driven by […]

title: CES 2024 – Exploring the Pinnacle of AI-Powered Tech Marvels
description: In a world immersed in technological marvels, CES 2024 is proving to be a haven for artificial intelligence enthusiasts. AI has not just found its place; it’s taken center stage, infiltrating diverse sectors of our daily lives. From transforming how we communicate with our smartphones to creating interactive personal assistant robots, the innovations showcased this […]
